website_summaries.verdict: The perfect cover to protect against pet hair, claws, and even small spills.
pros: Cover is easy to put on and feels silky smooth
Elastic straps ensure the cover stays in place all day
Water-resistant material protects against light spills as well as pet hair and can be machine washed

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric, well made
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says it is. Great fabric, well made, perfect size and colors. I got the medium size. My dog, Kilo pictured is 50lbs and fits nicely on it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kleisler

customer_reviews.title: Doggie approved!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived today and I was happy with it. It was easy to install the anchors and it’s soft and comfy. As you can see my Greyhound takes up most of the couch but the X-Large size worked nicely. The bolster is soft and the zipper allows for easy removal so you can throw it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G.

customer_reviews.title: Saving my couch a hair at time
customer_reviews.text: I was going nuts trying to keep my couch clean of dog hair. This was a little more than I wanted to spend, especially given I didn’t know if she would actually lay on it, but it’s great! She usually goes right to her new little spot
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT OR WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATER RESISTANT! I purchased this only because it claims to be water resistant and I have a cat who has decided to use my couch as it’s litter box. Suffice it to say, it is NOT water resistant, water and urine go right through this as though nothing is covering my couch. Now I have a couch with fresh pee after I paid $100 to get it professionally cleaned and thought this would protect it in the future. I DO NOT RECOMMEND. At all. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This cover was actually amazing, until my dog ate it
customer_reviews.text: This cover was actually amazing, until my dog ate it.......... I have one chair where the corgis seem to congregate on and well, they shed like it is their job. The chair is one of those big comfy ones so I bought the loveseat size. This looked great, was easier to clean than vacuuming the chair and trying to get fur out of crevices. I would just toss it in the dryer on no heat for a few minutes and then clean the lint trap. Also made prepping for guests much easier. The foam/elastic bands hold it in place even with rowdy puppies jumping on and off, but don't hold up to being eaten. Which is completely acceptable....
customer_reviews.author: DTirelli

customer_reviews.title: Henry gives his Sofa Buddy two Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: My mini dachsie loves it. Fits our wing back chair perfectly. Is well made. The bolsters need a little support like they would have in a close fitting chair.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: What she said...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little bigger. If I had to do it again I might by the extra large for my Labrador but he'll make the large work. He's just happy to have a spot on the couch. The anchors come with the product which are tucked into the sofa cushion are a creative and useful touch.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonKH

customer_reviews.title: Not as pretty as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Fit is pretty awful and I found these to be of thinner construction than expected. They're comfortable enough and the dogs like them too. They look like moving pads, so they might not fit everyone's taste. Considering the alternative -- pet hair, mud, drool, and dirt -- they look pretty good! Instructions would be nice. Figuring out what to do with the strap was a challenge. Hint: It connects to the front of the seat back and wraps around back.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: You're better off covering your couch with trash bags
customer_reviews.text: These things are the bane of my existence. We ordered one size for our small couch, but it was too small. Ordered the largest size, and it was still too small. We kept both anyway. They don't stay anchored, they bunch up, they fall off, and they are definitely not water resistant in any sense of the phrase, and they have both torn in the same spots after a couple of months. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: condopresident

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Great couch Blanket! Sweeps easily and dog loves it and matches my couch. I got the large size and its bigger than expected. My dog weighs about 70 lbs and the large is plenty big! It stays on the couch just fine with out the attachments you can use but my couch isn't leather. Def good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaH

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet sofa cover and so does my English Cream Golden girl Bristol. She is 70 lbs and the anchors help to keep this from slipping around on sofa. I bought the Large size and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Henry

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product specifically because it says it was water resistant and showed a picture of water beading up on the surface. My dog tinkled a bit on the surface and it went right through. Don't believe the hype. It needs some sort of slick surface underneath to truly have a waterproof barrier. Now I have to get my couch cushions cleaned to get that annoying pet urine ammonia smell out. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Tahsir

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have a standard poodle puppy that likes cooler surfaces to sleep on, surprisingly this cover does not make him as hot as others in the past. Once anchored it stays secure, and the size is accurate. I ordered an XL, my puppy is currently 50ish pounds but should be around 70 full grown, poodles are naturally longer so I wanted to account for that. He also sleeps sprawled out..see picture 😂. Anyways, fabric is great, easy to clean, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Seetram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for loveseat. Stays in place too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different cover for a small love seat I have at the end of my bed. That cover was always falling off and had no way to stay on. This cover is perfect size for loveseat. It also has nice padding on the edges. Best part is that it does stay in place with items it comes with. One of my dogs loves knocking pillows etc off of the couch. He loves playing under blankets. So far he hasn’t been able to knock this off the love seat which is great as my 60pound Australian Shepherd sheds like crazy. So my love seat is protected-perfect!
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have a golden retriever puppy, and while I swore I wasn't going to let him on the furniture you can't resist their faces. I bought a sofa cover, but hated it. It wouldn't stay in place. This is just what we needed. It stays in place and looks so much neater than the sofa cover. It also gives him comfort while protecting my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Vanloo

customer_reviews.title: First Make Sure Your Dog Knows They Are A Dog
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made. And it would work just fine, if our lab would leave it on the couch. It's just that she doesn't think she is a dog, so she shouldn't have to use it. So while I am dreaming about the dog in the photo, and my lab actually really resembles that dog, we have a real personality issue which prevents her from laying on it. She gets on the couch, promptly moves it and then lays down. But, it is well made! I recommend it to anyone has a trained dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected. Material not expected.
customer_reviews.text: I placed this on my sofa so my husky wouldn’t run our fabric couch. It fits well and overall I like it, but I wished the fabric was different. It clings onto everything! Dirt, dander, hair, etc. you go to wash it and nothing comes out. I have to wash it and then hand vacuum and there’s still hair leftover. If it was a different material where hair easily came off, I would like it more.
customer_reviews.author: Rdaddy4004

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, broken dog!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is perfect for my couch. I had bought a another large cover out of the same material, the material wears really well. I have washed the cover many times and it holds up. However I can’t get my dog to read the owners manual on how to use the bed properly!
customer_reviews.author: vetb

customer_reviews.title: Great for any pet owner!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for my dogs! I just bought new furniture, including a couch set, and wanted to find a way to keep dog claws and fur off the new set. This works perfectly! The pillow pieces come out of a zip ouches, making it super easy to wash/maintain. It includes handles that you push between the back of the couch and the seat to prevent it from slipping out/around. I’d highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Caseltine

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just after purchasing a new couch. I dont let my pup normally hang out on my furniture however, once the new couch arrived, I couldn't seem to keep her off of it. Had to find a solution that kept my couch clean and I wouldn't have to worry about leaving the house and having her climb all over it (I always catch her on it the second I walk through the door). This was perfect. She has her own little section of the couch. I flipped it so the cushion is on the outside and just tucked in the quilted portion. It stays pretty well and she knows exactly where her place is. exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Conde

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice looking little slip cover until my dog ripped the stuffing out of it. It was just what I wanted and fit securely on the part of the sofa he usually say on. It lasted a few months. If your dog isn’t into gutting pillows and stuffed things, this might work. Otherwise, I don’t think I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Alright...
customer_reviews.text: I have a German shepherd who loves the couch. She uses this but it's not all that water resistant and the sides kind of collapsed down a little. Since it doesn't have a back to it she gets hair all over the couch still. I ended up pulling it and just using a regular blanket instead.. Blankets are easier to wash and quicker to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: megman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my recliner perfectly. Bought it to protect the fabric from my dog who likes to dig. We don’t allow her on the furniture but have caught her in my new recliner several times so better safe than sorry. I’ve also used it in my car and it helps her slide less on the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT water resistant
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping furniture free of fur and they're easy to clean - just throw in the laundry. They're not exactly water resistant. Pet urine goes right through the cover to the furniture. If you need them for pet accidents, look elsewhere. If you want them for everyday dirt and fur, great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a Great Dane mix and between his drool and constant paw licking, he was ruining my couch. The hair vacuums right off and the material seems very durable, like it will definitely hold up in the wash. The pillow sections are super soft. I didn’t use the anchors since there’s a sheet underneath for maximum drool protection on “his” side of the couch but it doesn’t slide off without them. I got the XL size, he’s about 130 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Sofa sized is too small, this has potential If they’d change the size and back strap
customer_reviews.text: As a few others have stated, the sofa size is too small for a sofa and a little big for a love seat. I love the idea of the bumpers tucking into the sofa to keep it in place. However, the white strap across the back of my visible dark brown love seat is hideous. I got it on a warehouse deal so I’ll keep it, but If I would have paid full price I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting supreme quality (waterproof, etc) for that price. A bit disappointed since it is just fabric stuffed with pillows. Nothing a well skilled person couldn't replicate with materials found at your local craft store for less than $10 dollars. You can find similar products much cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DC BOS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not cozy enough!
customer_reviews.text: We got this pet sofa cover for our Puggle. I love how it comes with anchors to secure it under the cushions. However, our dog is a snuggler and likes to tuck in with us, off the bed. The sides aren’t as big as I expected and don’t continue the length of the bed. The fabric is sturdy, but not cozy. I would love this product if I could get my pet to actually go on it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnIrene

customer_reviews.title: THEY KNEW WHAT TO DO WITHOUT BEING TOLD
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is, the cat commandeered both of these cute sofa protectors so I had to buy a third one. All the kiddos take up the whole couch now, but at least when company comes I can take them off. Haven't washed them yet, hope they launder well. See well made and price is reasonable. These are smaller than other ones available online which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CherokeeSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Nice Protecting Cover
customer_reviews.text: This throw fit my chair(smaller than one shown) even better than I had hoped. Stays in place well because of oversize. I have to agree with others who say white strap is not attractive and could be done in color to match instead of white. Also, strap was not long enough so pulled out of casing when animal jumped onto chair. Luckily, because the back is so long on my chair the strap became unnecessary. My animal is comfortable and I am no longer having to constantly refit previous throw. I hope proves waterproof this winter when wet paws are on it. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps most of the hair off my couch
customer_reviews.text: This is second one of these I've purchased. I had the last one for 5 years, but my son's new dog chewed it up. Otherwise, it'd still be okay. This cover works pretty well and stays put. Cleans in washer. Decreases all the hair from shedding and keeps couch from smelling like dog.
customer_reviews.author: swalk

customer_reviews.title: Great investment to save our couch
customer_reviews.text: No longer need to put blankets for protection. Good investment & they love it! I got the medium because they both spend a lot of time on the couch. Then when company comes I easily remove it. Anchor is good. I do wish the backing of the bed stood up more firmly but overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: 714MissUnderstood

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and fabric
customer_reviews.text: Furhaven Pet Furniture Cover | Two-Tone Reversible Water-Resistant Quilted Living Room Furniture Cover Protection helps to keep our sofa clean despite to our dogs rest and play. The elastics and two wrinkles stops, helps to keep the cover in place. Bought in two tone of grey, very happy for this purchase. Easy to clean, just put in washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: I love these couch protectors
customer_reviews.text: I love these couch protectors! The material is very sturdy and attractive.The best part is that they stay put, needing very little adjustment after I have been up and down on it throughout the evening. I really like the color, and it will look just as nice when I flip them over to the lighter color. I really think they were worth the extra money I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product but after a couple weeks the anchors got stretched out and they always pop out of the couch or the cushion gets shoved into the couch. The point of this was to protect my couch from scratches and dog hair and it’s doing neither.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new, fabric sofa, and was concerned that my lounge-lizard dogs would leave a ton of hair (and dirt) on it. I bought a cover for 2/3 of the sofa (the dogs' part) and it is very nice. Pretty fabric, reversible, little pillow/bolsters that you can remove if you wish. So far I do not need the anchors, but they would be handy on leather or slick fabric furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I did measure before ordering. This cover is too small to fit securely on our sofa. It also attracts and holds dog hair. I was looking for something that would appear nice, and protect from my dogs' fur and feet. I will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Sams

customer_reviews.title: Protects Chair
customer_reviews.text: Fits chair, and protects from hair. It is water resistant but I wouldn't expect it to be waterproof should you spill a glass of water on it. The colors are as shown but the color is flat, there is no sheen to it. Stays in place for the most part, if the dogs get up on the chair and play around it shifts around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for accent chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed for the chairs in my living room. The anchor keeps the covers attached and the bumper keeps the back of the chair from getting too hairy. They’re easy to wash and have been durable thus far. Not completely waterproof but will prevent most of a spill from getting to the actual seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mia G.

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job
customer_reviews.text: It's doing the job we got it for---protecting new sofa from doggie drool and such. It might be nice to have a flap that goes over the arm of the sofa. Our dog always rests her head on that, so we have to add another little fleece on the arm to capture 'leaks' from our pup. NIce product overall.
customer_reviews.author: pigcoon

customer_reviews.title: Washable!
customer_reviews.text: This will work perfect. The anchors to hold it down in the back are secured. I took it out of the box and put it on his usual spot. My dog went on it immediately and slept! I like the fact this is washable. Will be easy to remove when company is coming over.
customer_reviews.author: Katden

customer_reviews.title: We use it on the bed
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this. I recently got a second dog. When it was just one dog it wasn’t bad sharing a bed. But these two big girls took up so much space and wanted to both be by me. Instead of using it on the couch I use it on my bed. I use it to keep them on their side so I can have room. Sooo good. Now I just tell them to get in bed and they get into their side and I can actually have a full half f my own bed
customer_reviews.author: Ilyia

customer_reviews.title: Great couch cover for my furry baby
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wish I would have bought this cover when we first let our dog on the couch. We’re able to still have our pillows on the couch with the cover still there and her laying on it. We bought a medium. The only thing I wish was that there were clips or Velcro so it doesn’t move when she jumps on the couch. Other than that, great buy! 🙌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Could be more sturdy to hold shape
customer_reviews.text: Color and size are exactly as pictured, however the sides don’t stay up they fall open and mine came with a small rip at the seam. Will be easier for me to fix then have to hassle to return it. Also the bolsters do come out to make it easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Lightweight, No Thickness to Pad
customer_reviews.text: Would have been happier if fabric was more robust - thicker and sturdier. The dog has no interest in this despite the cushioned surround on the back and sides. I think it's quite overpriced if I compare to the value of the much sturdier covers I purchased for loveseat and sofa.
customer_reviews.author: RaleighReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with my furniture
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when we bought a sectional that wasn't leather. I have tried covers before but they either didn't stay or hid the beauty of the couch. These are cute, secure and can easily be removed for company. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Anchors do not work well.
customer_reviews.text: This couch protector dog bed is basically what you expect, except the Anchors that are meant to keep it in place are not very good. They are elastic straps with a foam piece that you stuff behind the cushions, they keep it ON the couch, but not in place or snug. I think this would be better for little dogs that don't put as much pressure on it to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: atians

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a day or two, so can't speak to the durability or anything like that, but my dog loves it, and it goes well with my new couch that I wanted to protect from dog hair, etc. It feels really soft too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I have a fabric sofa, and my dog seems to think there is a treasure buried in the cushions. The cover has protected the fabric of the cushions from his nails and is holding up beautifully = no sign of tearing or wearing. I could not figure out how the straps to help hold the cover in place were supposed to work, though, so I had to come up with something on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F.

customer_reviews.title: Does it job
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well, and my dog quickly adjusted to it being "his spot". My only complaint is that it doesnt like to stay put on our leather sofa. Since it is reversible, both sides are somewhat smooth and it slides around easily. The included anchor strap keeps it from falling off or moving too far, but not hard for the dog to slide it out of the way when jumping onto the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: S.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good looking option
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to get our pupper used to it, but now he happily lays there. Unfortunately, he still tries to wander onto the rest of the couch from time to time. This was a much more visually appealing option that the blanket we had before.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. We got a new giant couch but because our dog loves blankets and pillows he gravitated towards this spot. When I cleaned it I just threw the whole thing in the washer and dryer. It both cleaned and held up really well. Our couch was actually deep enough that we didn't use any of the fasteners. But it stays put just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: No bolster or cushion anchors!
customer_reviews.text: The protector pad was supposed to come with a bolster, as described in the product info. It came empty with no stuffing in the bolster part! No cushion anchors either! Just small fabric loops as seen in the picture. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vhall

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first day
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that will not stay off my couch. In order to protect it from nail punctures, I purchased this. It works well if it stays in place which is never does. One of the tethers holding it on the couch broke the first day of use. it would probably work better if there were tethers on all four corners.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is great. Dark brown on one side and tan on the other, reversible works great. It also can be washed on gentle cycle and dried on low temp and turns out like new. I've tried a couple of other couch dog beds and this is the best so far. There is a strap underneath that holds it on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Crawford

customer_reviews.title: The best idea ever!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this, our dog has been trained to know that this is the only spot he is allowed on. It is also easily removable for when guests come over. We have recommended this product to friends and family and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: We like the style.
customer_reviews.text: We like it and so do the pets. It’s soft. It wasn’t as long as I needed for our sofa so I sewed two together. The love seat style fit our loveseat. We use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis G.

customer_reviews.title: Couch saver for sure
customer_reviews.text: We had been using blankets to save the leather couch from the dogs but they kept falling off. this item looks great and locks onto the couch....problem solver for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Putnam Jr

customer_reviews.title: my husky Loves it ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I got an XL. It’s bigger than I thought it would be. He loves to sleep on the couch so I thought this would be perfect for my dog. He’s a siberian husky, once I got it on the couch he jumped right onto it. HE LOVES ITTT!!! The size and the color is perfect, also keeps all the fur from going into the couch. Plus it’s very easy to wash. It has zipper so you can take out the padding/ pillows it has inside of it and throw it in the washer machine. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has a dog that loves to lay and sleep on a couch 😊
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: but lets our cats be comfortable on a chair
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these in our living room. Keeps the pet fur completely off the furniture, but lets our cats be comfortable on a chair. Easy to pick up when company comes and no fur left behind. We have one cat that's a leaner, and he loves to rest his head on the side bolsters.
customer_reviews.author: mippsy

customer_reviews.title: Fabric did not match
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two and the fabrics did not match similar to what another person noted in another review. They posted pics to their review. Returned for a refund. Also the packaging says made in China. After recent events (early 2020), I try to avoid products made in part or in whole from China.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The furniture cover was exactly what I was looking for. I don’t have to worry about any possible pet stains and fur ruining our brand new furniture. If I had to nit pick anything it would be that i wish they would make one for a sectionals. I purchased two to make it work for my living room set up.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo, this didn’t work for us. Quality seems okay but the back should be much higher. The few times that my dog did use it, she left hair all over the back of the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Use it on the bed and couch to help keep fur off, dog loves having her own spot. I got the extra-large size and it's pretty much perfect for her size.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great spot for the dog, but I wish it was taller
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves that she can join us on the new couch, but she's so tall that even when she lays down, she gets her hair on the couch. It's pretty durable though, and definitely her favorite spot.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two beagles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my dogs hair all over the couch due to shedding. It’s a soft material and the cushion padding is good. It’s removal so you can wash. I highly doubt this is water resistant so if your dog is accident prone, I don’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with no slipping
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for our couch for our puppy. It’s well made and stays in place with the anchors that fit down in the couch. Washed up well and looks nice. Only issue is training our puppy to only lie on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cover and it looked very nice on my sofa. Unfortunately the front of it did not hang down as far as the picture shows. When my German Shepherd would jump up on the couch the cover would ride up. I was constantly having to straighten it. If the front could have been secured as well as the back it then it would have been perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can already tell it isn’t the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: I’ve already added Velcro so that my dog doesn’t catch her paws on the portion that overhangs and drag it up when she hops on the couch. We’ll see if it stays put with time. Cats really seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Wingo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love em
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a few weeks and my dogs love them. Was super easy to train them to use now they lay on them without command. Can’t speak to durability just yet as haven’t had to machine wash. Little paw prints did easily clean up with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Happy
customer_reviews.text: I like this because the cushions come out and the cover can be washed. It did not shrink. I didn't give 5 stars because the sides were not firm enough to stay upright, they sort of flattened down.
customer_reviews.author: Blue's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Schnauzer loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this! I have the large one and it covers an entire couch cushion. The dog loves the pillow part. He won’t share is the only negative lol. Side note: my first time ordering this Amazon accidentally sent me a returned cushion cover with dog hair on it but problem was fixed quickly when I called for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Well Made but Doesn't Look Like Photo
customer_reviews.text: The fabric really doesn't have the sheen in person that it does in the photo. It's pretty large for our couch, which is deeper than your average. Returned it. Back to looking for a dog-couch solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item, exactly what we needed. Our little fur baby loves it. The mocha and tan color goes well with our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: T Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Couch size didn’t come close to fitting my standard couch. About 6 inches short on each end. Material is very thin. Senior cat had an accident on it. And urine went right thru to the couch. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Slides on leather couch
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea, but it still slides around on a leather couch, even with anchors in place. (could use a rubber backing), it makes my dog uneasy when he jumps up and the mat slides under his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 47lb mixed breed dog to use on leather sofa. Good quality for the money. I wish I purchased the large as it seems small
customer_reviews.author: E Family #1

customer_reviews.title: Works well on leather couch
customer_reviews.text: Got this when we bought a leather couch, our lab/pit mix likes it, we bought a medium. It’s light weight and the straps that have a grip fit nicely down into the couch to keep it in place. After months of having it there is one small tear from my dog “nesting” otherwise can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is not waterproof. I should start by saying that. It does make a GREAT barrier between your pet and the couch, but if they have a potty accident or are wet, this will not protect your furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Daly

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: The pet furniture cover arrived today. It was shipped in the usual amazon grey plastic and did not come in any other packaging. No tags, nothing. Kind of like folding up a blanket, and shipping it. It could have been used for all I know.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great for messy pups!
customer_reviews.text: Great for messy doggies my dog loves that she has her own spot on the couch now and it matches the couch and she no longer ruins the couch with her drool and gross bones!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Still looks good after washing and three cats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a double recliner, so I have to make sure it is tucked in each morning but that is not the fault of the product. It cleans well, is not slippery and the cats cannot make claw marks in it. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: veronica nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Furniture covers too flimsy and don’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Material too flimsy. Rollers that were supposed to keep the cover tucked in did Not work and the top cover going over the back of the chair fell down into the seat frequently.
customer_reviews.author: The Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover for protecting our new leather couch from scratches. Our fur baby seems to like it too. A great feel, perfect size, the pillow part is wonderful and the pieces that hold it on work perfect. I will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: njr

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old Labrador. It has held up well enough to cover the couch cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and does the job for which its intended.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use and that it only takes up a portion of the couch rather than the entire seating area. It is super easy to throw in the washing machine once you remove the pillow inserts. They have their own pockets in which to sit and one zipper for the entire length.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep on, thin, and the straps make zero sense. It is not water proof or resistant.
customer_reviews.author: AllyCat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this. It’s good quality. We ordered a large for our 75lb bloodhound. Size is perfect, price was good. However, this whole thing is pointless if you have a stubborn dog.
customer_reviews.author: HoundDogFamily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stays in place, easy to wash in the washing machine. I like that it's reversible and I like that I can just remove it when I have company and the couch is drool and hair free!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it but wish it was a little larger in width but it's well made .
customer_reviews.author: Damaries Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves this. I wish it was above a foot less wide to take up less sofa space. It does a great job of keeping dog hair off the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them looking new and clean
customer_reviews.text: They do a good job protecting the couches, had to buy two and sew them together to fit the long sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: STAY IN PLACE
customer_reviews.text: These are the best covers because of the latches that keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: 12catlady

customer_reviews.title: Nice but breaks easy.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 5 months. Zipper broke could not fix. Also wish there was away to hold down the front. When dog jump on half the time front flap was under him. If zipper was better quality would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I think Rueben says it all. Very nice, easy to attach, stays put, great color and the size large covers a good area. Rueben is 55lbs, but long & tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps couch clean!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for about 6 months. Super easy to clean and keeps her fur off my couch. Good durability as I have not noticed any signs of wear and tear. The only issue I have is it's not available in a softer fabric. My dog still wants to get on the velvet fabric of my couch because she is a little princess.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Michelle Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying another one
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 3 cushion sofa, in combination with my shedding part-husky best friend :)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Legare

customer_reviews.title: Shows hair & hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Shows more hair and harder to clean than my couch. I purchased this to try and consolidate dog hair so not helpful for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month and washed only once and it ripped on the back side. Not durable and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lpoly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Love that it fits just right. Wipes off easily (dog drool). Color is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Millie

product_meta.title: Furhaven Pet - Two-Tone Reversible Water-Resistant Living Room Furniture Sofa & Couch Furniture Cover Protector for Dogs & Cats - Multiple Styles, Sizes, & Colors
product_meta.description: Color:Navy & Light Blue| Size:Loveseat| Style:Furniture ProtectorFully reversible, water repellent, soft-quilted furniture protectors help keep pet hair, moisture, and little pet accidents off your furniture. Furhaven Two-Tone Reversible Water-Resistant Living Room Furniture Cover Protector protects your furniture from your pet’s daily use with water-resistant coating and pinsonic quilting. Pinsonic quilting is a thread-free, durable method of electronically bonding the water-resistant fabric with ultrasonic heat; no holes are sewn maximizing water resistance. Our machine washable reversible cover is easily secured with no-fuss cushion anchors and sturdy elastic bands. Furhaven quilted-fabric furniture covers let your dog or cat lounge in their favorite spots without putting any little pet-messes directly on your furniture.
feature_bullets: FURNITURE PROTECTION: The furniture protector features a mantle-like design that covers the seats, armrests, and backrest to keep your living room upholstery free from pet-related stains and debris
WATER-RESISTANT: The cover protector is made from thread-free pinsonic quilted fabric with water-repellent coating to maximize protection against spills and accidents

SLEEP SURFACE: The furniture cover is lined with soft-to-touch fabric, with the quilted seams adding a bit of cushioned padding for enhanced cuddling comfort; it features a reversible two-toned color scheme to better complement your home decor

SAFE & SECURE: The cover comes with cushion anchors and adjustable elastic straps to keep it fastened against the furniture; these measures will help keep the cover from shifting and sliding for better overall protection and improved pet safety
PRODUCT DETAILS: Navy & Light Blue; Loveseat, 96" x 75" x .25"
AVAILABLE VARIANTS: The furniture protector comes in Espresso & Clay, Navy & Light Blue, and Gray & Mist; it's also available in Chaise, Loveseat, and Sofa sizes
EASY CARE: Pets can present some unique cleaning challenges, which is why Furhaven made sure that the furniture protector cover is completely machine washable for your convenience

CUSTOMER ASSURANCE: The product comes with a 90-day limited coverage against material defects and may also qualify for our 60-Day Worry-Free Program; but restrictions apply: purchases from unauthorized third-party resellers may not be covered by Furhaven

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
